alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Harris; Liberty; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 8:56PM CDT until June 10 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... Chambers County in southeastern Texas... Liberty County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 856 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Batson to near Dayton Lakes to 8 miles southeast of Cleveland to near Splendora to Cut And Shoot, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northern Baytown, Conroe, Humble, Liberty, Dayton, Beach City, Northside / Northline, Kingwood, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Highlands, Barrett, Aldine, Channelview, The Woodlands, Crosby, Mont Belvieu, Oak Ridge North, Anahuac and Panorama Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
